ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name <> 'Sapper_CSS', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Salesforce Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Executive Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Quality/Training Staff', $Profile.Name <> 'Project Team Leader', $Profile.Name <> 'Accounting Generalist', $Profile.Name <> 'Project Owner - Implementations', $UserRole.Name <>'Implementation Manager', $User.Id <>'0054w00000A4jxO', $User.Id <>'0054A000009E95B', $User.Id<>'0054A000009EB78', Sales_Director_Approved__c = TRUE, NOT(ISCHANGED(IPM_Can_Welcome_Client__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Kickoff_Meeting_Data__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Implementation_Explanation__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Update_Implementation_Explanation__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Marketing_Manager__c)) )
